title: Ranked team rewards!!!!Come
body:
Hi brothers and sisters.

This is a casual team, and we are after the ultimte ward skins.

We currently have ad, jg and mid. Ad was diamond, jg(me) gold, and mid was gold too. **We need a top and sup.** . 

We are very nice people to be teammates.  For long term goodness:** we need you to have a skype, to be at least silver 3. **

Dont hesitate to add me as friend. actually we are playing tonight. Come!

replies.body:
Summoner name: To be disclosed.
Rank: Above Gold.
Role: Support
Preferred Champions: Thresh, Sona, Janna, Karma, Zyra 
Let me know if you are interested on this thread and I will add you tonight.
